news.content:
Your Weekly 3Node Update!


https://forum.threefold.io/t/december-14th-3node-team-update-shipping-setting-up-your-titan-what-else-is-cooking/1576


What’s inside: Titans continue to go out in North America, clarifying Titan setup, and what else is cooking behind the scenes.


As always, please join us on the farmer chat for farming-related conversations & questions!
news.excerpt: Titans continue to go out in North America, clarifying Titan setup, and what else is cooking behind the scenes.

previous.title: Your January 6 3Node Team Update
previous.excerpt: This week's update is focused on shipping as well as farming rewards, anda  reminder about our deep dives!

next.title: Your December 8 Titan Update
next.excerpt: We’re in the midst of shipping a large batch of Titans to North America, and we’re expanding our partner network.
